params._hash: Hash of the data signed on the behalf of address(this).
params._signature: Signature byte array associated with _data. MUST return the bytes4 magic value 0x1626ba7e when function passes. MUST NOT modify state (using STATICCALL for solc < 0.5, view modifier for solc > 0.5) MUST allow external calls

isValidSignature(bytes32,bytes).notice: EIP1271 method to validate a signature.
